channel.title: Outpost: A Star Trek Fan Production
channel.description:
Star Trek Audio Drama from Giant Gnome Productions.
Life is good for Lt. Greg Torkelson aboard the USS Remington, a Starfleet research vessel stationed near the Venderis Nebula. However, when word comes that he’s been promoted to the Executive Officer of Deep Space Station 3, an outpost in the backwaters of Federation space, he quickly discovers that all is not as it appears, and what seems to be too good to be true just might be.
"In the darkest reaches of the United Federation of Planets, an isolated station stands sentinel over a neglected frontier. Commissioned long ago with high hopes, its promise is now all but forgotten; a lonely outpost serving as the gateway to the vast expanse beyond, where discovery… and adventure… await."
- Lt. Commander Gregory Torkelson
channel.itunes:author: Giant Gnome Productions

item.title: Star Trek: Outpost – Episode 1 – What Could Be So Bad?
item.description:
Giant Gnome Productions presents …
Star Trek: Outpost – Episode 1 – What Could Be So Bad?
Release Date: April 5, 2009
Episode 1 - What Could Be So Bad?
Life is good for Lt. Greg Torkelson aboard the USS Remington, a Starfleet research vessel stationed near the Venderis Nebula. However, when word comes that he’s been promoted to the Executive Officer of Deep Space Station 3, an outpost in the backwaters of Federation space, he quickly discovers that all is not as it appears, and what seems to be too good to be true just might be.
Cast & Crew
Robert Pepper as Lt. Commander Greg Torkelson
Katie Gomez as Lt. Renova Exler
Eleiece Krawiec as Dr. Rachel Winston
John Specht as Chief Burt "Hard" Knox
Cathy Rinella as Lt. Jennifer Forrestal
Damon Fries as Ensign Kyle
Nick Armstrong as Med Tech Giles
Kim Johnson as Med Tech Johnson
Travis Whelpley as DaiMon Yurrel
Jules Ismail as Goshen
Melissa D. Johnson as Lt. Karen Denali
Edward Gore as Captain Montaine Buchanan
Paul Lavelle as Captain Steele
CC Petersen as Captain Baker
Mark Zaricor as Captain Tyrellian
Chris Lipscombe as Klingon PA Announcer
Barry Wallace as Alien PA Announcer and Communications Officer
Myka Raymond as Computer and Human PA Announcer
Production Team
Writers/Directors/Producers: Daniel McIntosh and Tony Raymond
Executive Producer: Waleed Ovase
Audio Engineer: Tony Raymond
Announcer: Paul Lavelle
